questions.text: What kind of work environment do you prefer? (Select one)
options:
- Structured and organized (e.g., corporate office, laboratory)
- Creative and flexible (e.g., design studio, startup)
- Outdoors or hands-on (e.g., fieldwork, construction)
- Social and collaborative (e.g., NGOs, education)
- Independent and self-directed (e.g., freelance, research)

questions.text: What motivates you the most in your work or studies? (Select up to 2)

- Helping others or making a social impact
- Creating something new or innovative
- Learning and personal growth
- Achieving financial success or recognition
- Exploring new ideas or concepts

questions.text: How do you prefer to learn? (Select one)

questions.text: What is your long-term career goal? (Select one)
options:

- I want to create innovative technologies.
- I want to help people through healthcare or social work.
- I want to express myself through art or writing.
- I want to lead and manage teams in a business setting.
- I want to explore new ideas and concepts through research.
- I want to achieve financial success and recognition.

questions.text: What are your top selection criteria for choosing a school? (Select up to 3)
